author: Siamak Masnavi, CD Analytics
title: PEPE Slides 5% as Hype Fades Despite Elon Musk's April Nod
description: Pepe dipped nearly 5% after failed recovery attempts, as Bitcoin dominance rose above 65%, signaling broader market rotation away from altcoins.
content:
Pepe 
, one of the most prominent meme coins, is struggling to hold investor interest, falling 4.7% over the past 24 hours to $0.000009499, according to CoinDesk Research's technical analysis model.… [+2140 chars]
